description: Stretch one of your arms with the palm of your hand facing forward and pull your fingers upwards. 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it with your other arm. 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck with the help of your hands to the right and left, staying in the same position for a few seconds.
With both hands on the back of your head, pull it downwards, strecthing the back part of your neck.
Cross your legs and lower yourself with both hands stretched torwards the floor. Repeat the same movement switching legs.
While sitting, open your legs and try to reach the floor with the palm of your hands, repeat it 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull your knee against your chest and hold. Switch legs after 10 seconds.
While sitting, cross one leg and angle your torso forward. Switch leg after 10 seconds.
While sitting, close your eyes and cover them with both palms of your hands for 2 minutes.
In an open enviroment, look as far as you can in four different directions for 3s, move only your eyes. Repeat it for 3 times.
With your thumbs, massage the area under your eyebrowns using a circular motion for 15 seconds.
While standing, twist your waist as much as you can to the left and hold it for 5 seconds. Repeat it to the right.
